'''Chapter IV''' is the [[Archon Quest]] chapter set in the nation of [[Fontaine]].

{{Quote|The God of Justice lives for the spectacle of the courtroom, seeking to judge all other gods. But even she knows not to make an enemy of the divine.|[[Dainsleif]]|[[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail|Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]]<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/TAlKhARUcoY Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]</ref>}}

==Summary==
===Act I - Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur===
{{Main|Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur}}
{{Description|You've learned many new things about the world and benefited greatly from your trip to Sumeru. What significance, then, will your next stop &mdash; Fontaine, the Nation of Justice and Judgment &mdash; have for your journey through Teyvat?|[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/20856330 Acts I and II Announcement Description]}}
{{Transclude|Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur|Summary}}

===Act II - As Light Rain Falls Without Reason===
{{Transclude|As Light Rain Falls Without Reason|Summary|main=1|top=1}}

===Act III - To the Stars Shining in the Depths===
{{Main|To the Stars Shining in the Depths}}
{{Description|The prophecy lies heavy on the hearts of the people, who witnessed the marvels of the deep in silence. A disaster... or a miracle? In the moment it seized its destiny, the star fell quietly from its lofty perch.|[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/21853621 Acts III and IV Announcement Description]}}
{{Transclude|To the Stars Shining in the Depths|Summary}}

===Act IV - Cataclysm's Quickening===
{{Transclude|Cataclysm's Quickening|Summary|main=1|top=1}}

===Act V - Masquerade of the Guilty===
{{Main|Masquerade of the Guilty}}
{{Description|What original sin does the [[Focalors|God of Justice]], who claims to judge the gods, herself bear... One cannot make an enemy of the divine. If the [[Heavenly Principles]] are not to be defied, the answer shouldn't be to bow one's head and wait for death. Instead, let there be a spin, a hop, and a skip. Then, let the "sinner" take a final bow.|[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/22782131 Act V Announcement Description]}}
{{Transclude|Masquerade of the Guilty|Summary}}

===Act VI - Bedtime Story===
{{Main|Bedtime Story}}
{{Description|After listening to the bedtime story that day, all the hilichurls had a dream.<br>The young soul waved goodbye, and the people and sun slept together warmly.|[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/29435755 Act VI Announcement Description]}}
{{Transclude|Bedtime Story|Summary}}
